history.proof: intros T f v t H. qsimpl use: forallH,forallE. qsimpl use: forallH,forallE. hauto l: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros T f v t H.
exceptions.tactic: apply forallE with (T := T) (f := forallH v f) (v := v) (t := t) in H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t)" on hypothesis of type "SysPrf T (forallH v f)".

ctx: intros T f v t H.
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (t : fol.Term L), folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.forallH L v f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (substituteFormula L f v t) T : System f : Formula v : nat t : Term H0 : fol.Formula LNT x : fol.Formulas LNT x0 : Prf LNT x (forallH v f) H : forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) T g Unable to unify "T ?M3369" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm (substituteFormula LNT f v t)), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) T g".

original: intros T f v t H. apply forallE with (T := T) (f := forallH v f) (v := v) (t := t) in H. apply H.
